item.title: Backing up NextCloud data with Rclone and Backblaze B2
item.description: I’m only backing this up to backblaze b2 right now, I also have a weekly snapshot of my vm. To make our backup i’m using rclone. I have backblaze set to keep a week of changes. The cost is very small, it is costing me about $0.40 a month right now. We are not going to backup all the server, just the data. I also include a week of database dumps.
